title: Single Point of Contact for Entire Transaction
text: Understand your desire to use specialty teams for the phases of the transaction.  However, you need to have a single point of contact that spans all phases from start to finish.  Had that for the previous refinance but was woefully lacking this time around.  I suspect the initial contact for the refinance was actually doing that on his own initiative.  He made a big difference in the experience.  Missing in action for this transaction and a major disappointment.

title: The experience was easy but the one…
text: The experience was easy but the one issue is the cashier checks you send to make payment...one of the checks was to pay off balance on a charge card but the check exceeded the balance owed...the store would not accept check as payment since it was more than owed...now i have to make charges on the card to match the amount on the check...

title: Everything was great until it comes to…
text: Everything was great until it comes to actually funding the loan. Going on 3 weeks and I’m still waiting on Rocket Mortgage to pay off original mortgage. I guess that means I’m paying interest on both loans!  Not good.

title: Not great communication at closing.
text: The actual closing using notaries was a problem.  Notary cancelled appointment, no notification, and had to reschedule.  That changed wire/closing amount.  Rocket did correct their mistake though.

title: My mortgage assistant at Rocket kept me up to the minute on my refi!
text: My mortgage assistant at Rocket kept me informed from the start of what I needed to do to keep things moving along.One problem that ended up delaying our closing was caused when I paid off a bunch of credit debt rather than have it paid off by the refi because I did not want to pay interest to Rocket for paying off my credit debt as it was all interest free. It delayed the closing because I discovered it was difficult for me to prove that the debts were paid off!

title: Anthony was great
text: Anthony was great, knowledge, very helpful and patient. Very helpful getting through process.

title: It was quite expensive just to change…
text: It was quite expensive just to change the interest rate.  This should be a much easier and less expensive process.

title: Sam Farraj was better than good
text: Sam Farraj was better than good. He made this a pleasant experience for me and my family. He was awesome

title: Looking for a reputable Mortgage company? Look no further….
text: I love Rocket Mortgage. They were extremely helpful when I got my first mortgage, they walked me through the process and made everything so stress free. In all honesty the refinancing process wasn’t as stress free for me, but I trust this company and find them to be very reputable and their rates were the best that I found. They were great in terms of answering my questions and navigating me through the process, they also worked well with my Realtor. I highly recommend Rocket Mortgage.

title: The professionalism and courtesy of all…
text: The professionalism and courtesy of all the members of your team made this experience much less stressful than it otherwise could have been.  Even though there were some unexpected hiccups, the process came to a successful conclusion with which we are very happy.

title: At first I was given a rate of 6.75%…
text: At first I was given a rate of 6.75% and was told that if rates went down, they would automatically go down (due to my VA rating and outstanding credit score….. I went ahead and started the improvement on my house using my credit cards for materials…. When closing numbers came in my rate was higher and I was told if the rates went down I could file to refinance which would cost more money…… I was too far in with signing a contract with a contractor and couldn’t afford to have him quit then sue me!!!

title: The entire process was professional.Our…
text: The entire process was professional.Our first contact was Misty Hopper,who performed great service.The only wrench in the experience was the closing. We were to use  an app to prepare for a much quicker closing,but ours was much longer.We could not operate the app and it was confusing and so frustrating we have up.At the closing,we were told many people had the same problems.

title: While the everything went step by step…
text: While the everything went step by step , some of the steps seemed to be an afterthought. Last minute "tasks" showed up and I was expected to hurry to get them done. Some of the tasks, to me, seemed unnecessary but I was required to complete them at ever growing cost to me. I spent thousands on required tests and reports that in the end, some meant nothing. It seemed to me that I could not be trusted at my word and I was required to prove everything to the smallest detail which was really annoying. EVERY claim I made throughout was borne out to be true yet there was no apology. The rate was good I was given the cash I asked for so in the end, all is well in Camelot.

title: The experience of the staff is awesome
text: The experience of the staff is awesome, happy with everything EXCEPT the interest rate, I think we could have done better. But overall, 4/5

title: I thought that initially your…
text: I thought that initially your underwriting team was weak and did not understand all the forms and reports they received.  Seemed to focus all their attention on debt to income and ignored other important factors like total assets, liquid assets, and loan history of the applicant.  Those items should hold as much importance to the approval process.  Thankfully Robert Camp got involved and the approval process was much improved, and moved forward in a more normal fashion.  Thank you Robert.Joe Scarnato

title: I'm very disappointed right now
text: I'm very disappointed right now. I did a refinancing on the 3rd still waiting on my funds to get disbursed.  I always like Rocket but this blow my mind. My patience is coming to a end.

title: Repeat customers and this most things…
text: Repeat customers and this most things went smoothly, it was a little frustrating at times as we were always being shuffled to a new rep, and they had inconsistent answers.  Had to really work on getting the rate we should have been given up front.  In the end, all things shook out and ended on a positive note.

title: So overall things went well
text: So overall things went well. Really appreciated Mikel and our "closer" Lauren - They were very helpful but the reason I left off the last star off is because technology these days being what it is - there were at times quite a bit of confusion between different emails telling me that things were done and others telling me the things needed to be done and it was very frustrating at times.That being said it was a very good experience, and would definitely recommend ROCKET MORTGAGE. thank you Joanne and Robert Michener

title: Our lender was the most reliable and I…
text: Our lender was the most reliable and I think having her was a very strong addition.

title: Overall I enjoyed my experience with Rocket Mortgage.
text: Overall I enjoyed my experience with Rocket mortgage. Towards the end of closing things tended to get stressful as last minute documentation came up. It ended up coming from a finding during an appraisal which makes sense. Maybe having the appraisal done sooner would give customers more time to make corrections if needed. When it comes to help from Rocket mortgage agents I feel as if they did great explaining how the process works to buy a house.

title: Very helpful to my family thanks
text: Very helpful to my family thanks

title: LHJ and RBJ 2024…
text: We have been working with Rocket Mortgage for several years, the experience has always been painless! Our Loan Specialist was knowledgeable, however we never heard from him once we completed our first task.One of our task should have been to confirm each payoff instead of Rocket just using the numbers in the disclosure statement. Also, the Loan Specialist told us we could select our payment due date. However, when we Closed the Amrock Representative told us October 1st, 2024. Missed the email for changing the date, 1st-16th.

title: Very good experience…
text: Frank, our banker, deserves 5 stars for all he did for us.  The app was easy to navigate and the processing of uploading was simple.  The only issue we had, hence the 4 star rating, was the unnecessary delay due to Rocket using an inadequate title company.  Amrock should have been used from the start. Just saying.We will most definitely use Frank and Rocket in the future if the need arises and would recommend this company to others.

title: Everything was great until …
text: Everything was great until my personal banker quit, and I did not receive any notification.  I was left waiting and leaving messages to someone who was no longer available. It was not until I was voicing a compliant that I was told and received contact information on my new banker. This was a BIG miss on Rocket's end.

title: Although the process was not extremely…
text: Although the process was not extremely long, it took longer than it should have. I would have rated 5 stars for our experience but had some issues with the first person working on our case. Many times, we had to send multiple documents at least 2-3 times causing delays. Once we were assigned to Robert Camp, he made things happen quickly and efficiently.

title: The forced credit cards payments…
text: The forced credit cards payments triggered an issue with AMEX because the Rocket check amounts were so much higher than what was owed on the credit card. AMEX has now asked for a paystub and bank statement. It would’ve been preferred to not have to do the checks to the credit card company and consider alternate options.

title: It was done well
text: It was done well except for the closing which I asked to be done in person but had to do it over the phone

title: I am very happy with Rocket Mortgage!
text: I am very happy with Rocket Mortgage!! While it took a little longer than I expected and there wasn’t always a clear path to find needed information or help I did complete the journey and so thankful to get this done!

title: Easy to work with
text: Every team member I dealt with was wonderful.  They were very responsive and communicated with me every step of the way. They made it an easy, painless process.

title: Andrew at Rocket was great
text: Andrew was a very helpful guide and was very transparent and reassuring. It was important to continually build trust, while getting phone calls from scammers who knew we were trying to refi. I think there was an overestimation of equity expectations painted by rocket mortgage At first which ended up being half of what we needed to take retire credit cards, but Andrew still had a plan that would enable us to move to a HELOC after our credit score rises from this initial payoff.  We will continue to work with Rocket mortgage toward financial freedom. Rocket mortgage and Andrew RoysterAnd everyone I dealt with were very professional. If you're going through this process, I recommend having only one point of contact, which was in our case Andrew. Software in the system is a little buggy, but we were always able to refer back to Andrew for advice on what to do next, and what to ignore. On the whole I give Rocket a 98%, which beats any other company I talked to.

title: Very tailored service
text: The company representative took a lot of time with me to explain all different options and loan types to fit my needs very patient. Process went fairly smoothly with a few hiccups and some of the loan documents.

title: The initial handler of everything was…great
text: The initial handler of everything was great. Ana deserves 5 stars. She always answered questions.   Rocket mortgage was fast with their approval process and dispersal of monies. However their policy not to mail checks to credit card companies. Or giving customer the option.

title: The process of fairly easy
text: The process of fairly easy. Mostly digital, which is good for me. I did not like that I had to payout my debts on my own I wish they were just part of the process and the payment was sent after closing by the company or the closing team. The reps were quick to answer questions and easy to communicate with. I don’t appreciate all the extra calls from all the other companies that your information gets sold to. I don’t think it’s good or fair when we are customers to just have our information sold so that we get a ton of callers trying to get your business or sell you something after I did business with Rocket mortgage.

title: Refi
text: I felt a bit pressured to complete this refi before the 18 month offer expired even though the rates were not that much lower. The extra amount added to the mortgage was more than I had expected sense we were told there would be no fees for the refi. The Notary was very knowlegible and helpful with the signing. I have yet to receive any copies of the paperwork.

title: Get more Jacob's
text: Our customer care representative was super!  I would have rated a 5 based on our experience with Jacob.  The processing team has some nags.  They called us for items that were already in the packet, instructed us not to contact Jacob (no way) and overall that department didn't seem to know the next steps....Overall Rocket rates 4.5...Thanks

title: Rocket Mortgage Review
text: Overall, the experience was good. Our Executive Banker Brian Clancy did an excellent job. He was very friendly and kept us up to speed on what was going on and what the next steps were coming up. I didn't rate a 5 star because somewhere along the way there was a clerical error that delayed the closing which created stress because we had to push the movers out.

title: Jose Bricena is a superhero!
text: Jose Bricena was my saving grace. He was there for me through this long process. He went to bat for me when underwriting was being difficult-which happened A LOT. My only complaint is that the entire process took so long. I realize underwriting is just doing their job by being extremely picky, but they often would contradict what rocket mortgage would tell me. That caused a great deal of stress in my part. All in all, Jose made everything right and I am VERY HAPPY with the end result.

title: Good communication poor task requests.
text: Good communication.  Wish all tasks could be loaded.  We were frustrated by some tasks; especially financial where you used the middle number from credit reports instead of the account numbers.  We wasted many hours trying to track down what was being requested.

title: Good Experience
text: I am not a regular mortgage buyer so I do not know the process.  By having our own Rocket Specialist, it made the process seem easier.  She always answered the phone or got right back to us.

title: Karla Heard was awesome and very…
text: Karla Heard was awesome and very helpful.  You need more like her.However your admin/credit staff and online system leaves a lot to be desired.  Common sense in some of your requests anxiously does t apply.  It was very annoying to be told “it’s our policy” was used as opposed to common sense when looking at my details.  Additionally the online requests were unclear more than a few times and yet you couldn’t get someone to explain in a reasonable timeframe.  I will have to seriously consider referring anyone to Rocket Mortgage without a warning to them of the hassle they should expect.

title: Knowledgeable staff
text: Knowledgeable staff, Kory was great! There was just one thing that took place w/c caused the delay w/c was the picture that was submitted by the inspector that wasn't clear , reason why it took so long. The final paper work was great, can't remember his name but he was quick but  thorough.

title: Our Mortgage banker was very supportive…
text: Our Mortgage banker was very supportive and did her best to move the application quickly especially when the underwriting stage was taking time. The closing process was very smooth. The entire process from application to closing took less than 2 months. The RM online site was great once we got to know it.

title: A little better after contact with…
text: A little better after contact with broker

title: William and Tiara were always quick to…
text: William and Tiara were always quick to respond and answer any questions I had. They were informative and knowledgeable. They gave me notice when something was due and options to provide. I would have liked to have gone over the closing document line by line to review and understand what each item meant.

title: Rocket Mortgage was great
text: Rocket Mortgage was great. Everyone was helpful and answered all our questions. I knew where we were every step of the way.The title company was horrible and we almost walked away from the loan due to them. I think they are a separate division from Ricket Mortgage and I had to blur the review but no one from the title company has asked us for a review and honestly Rocket Mortgage should be aware of their partners poor performance.

title: They may take way to long to get you to the finish line but will get you there
text: Quick to get started and take your deposit but slow to the finish line. Wasn’t the lowest rate compared to comparable companies. I had to do foot work for them that others didn’t ask me to do. All in all it took too much time and they stumbled were their competition  didn’t. But at the end of the day they finished we signed and still took them 5 days after signing before we officially closed and received funding.

title: The mortgage loan process was…
text: The mortgage loan process was relatively easy.

title: My mortgage rep was great
text: My mortgage rep was great. There was a small delay in the execution of the mortgage, and with the closing, there was a double payment to my existing homeowners insurance escrow. I received a phone call two days later and was told I needed to pay over $4000 back, due to the overpayment and I would have to wait for my refund for at least two weeks on the overpayment.

title: Great process, if you get the right rep.
text: I’d give the mortgage process 5 stars.  Rocket makes the process quick & painless.  I didn’t give Rocket 5 stars due to the rep assigned to handle my account.  I had to return the paperwork to him way too many times for corrections.  When I pointed out multiple items on the same form for correction, it was like he didn’t bother to look further than the first correction.  And I don’t like playing 20 questions.  I expect a person in this position to be more forthcoming with information.

title: We had an overall wonderful experience…
text: We had an overall wonderful experience other than our loan officer going on vacation without telling us. Normally this wouldn’t be a problem, except that we were on a time crunch to close. I will say however, the rest of the team jumped in and helped get everything handled for an on time closing!

title: Its not like any type of loan you have had before.
text: Very helpful.  Things change fast so they we're always quick to fix problems that came up.  Not like a regular loan which was surprising but I was able to get the loan approved.  Not as fast as I would have hoped but it definitely was a learning experience that my team was willing to help me with since I also needed to learn how things worked along the way.

title: Overall very good experience
text: Overall very good experience, Katelyn  Haught was exceptional to work with. The closing was smoorh on 8/4/2024. My only complaint is the appraisal process. The paramaters used are terrible only good for areas with alot of homes to get a fair comparison.

title: We had an overall great experience with…
text: We had an overall great experience with the exception of the title research and the time it took to close on the last day of our locked in rate.

title: Overall experience
text: Our Loan Officer, Ryan, was very attentive and called or returned our calls promptly when we had questions.  Felt the whole process took longer than necessary.  Other than that, we are happy with the ending results.

title: Great service from beginning to end of…
text: Great service from beginning to end of the loan process

title: Overall
text: Overall, it was a good experience.  Some of the document uploads were a lot of work but finallywere all accomplished.  People tried to be very helpful.

title: Streamlined process was efficient
text: Streamlined process was efficient. Final disclosure could have been a day or two earlier. Request for rating every person you had contact with, even if it was a one sentence text, was a bit irritating. Overall very good experience.

title: Great response when I had a question
text: Great response when I had a question. Sent info and communicated well.

title: Nick Campbell was fantastic
text: Nick Campbell was fantastic. He helped every step of the way. Thanks for everything, Nick! We had a few hiccups with the closing team, but it all worked out in the end.

title: Great to work with!
text: This company was great to work with. They made the experience very easy and for the most part very straightforward.The reason I didn't give 5 stars is due to how they handle debt consolidation refinancing. It would have been 1000% easier with a direct deposit instead of having us wait for checks, and then having to mail individual checks out. I understand the process behind it and why it's like that. I'm hoping one day, it'll be a digital process that will be much faster. I think if they did a direct deposit, and then had us submit proof of payment, then that would be doable.

title: Representatives was great Ma Langford…
text: Representatives was great Ma Langford did a great job. I was disappointed in the number of time I had to resend information. The whole process was extended by your request of additional information at every turn. However I do appreciate your time put into thisCharles Townsend

title: That thing was able to be done online…
text: That thing was able to be done online except for the final signing and they came to my house

title: Refi. Quick, Easy, & Overall Good Experience
text: Mortgage bankers are friendly and knowledgeable.General customer service agents I found to be friendly, but gave generic responses and didn't answer my specific, simple. question.I did not like how Rocket pays off your credit debt. I was sent checks to mail to my creditors (vs Rocket paying electronically, as they did my old mortgage). I have 25 creditors. Meanwhile, I have had to pay the minimum monthly payment due, which of course will decrease the balance - leaving me to then to have to contact all 15 companies for a refund of the resulting overpayments. I believe if Rocket insist to pay the debts directly they should actually send the payments.Generally I would recommend.

title: Fastest refi ever!!!
text: The people.However, I know my request for refinance was out of the ordinary time-wise, there seemed to be a little issue with communication.Many of the automated messages I received were asking for documents I had already provided.Hence the 4 *s.

title: Service good, price rough
text: Service was fantastic! Prices are a lot higher than other areas in the market. Everyone was great to work with and they made the first time home buying experience a good experience. Would probably work with them again, but don’t plan on buying a new house.

title: My loan officer was amazing
text: My loan officer was amazing. The process of getting the mortgage was made so much easier for a first time home buyer like my self. My loan officer Geoffrey Giest was really informative and made sure that I understood everything that I was signing and explained things that I didn't understand. I would recommend him to anyone who is looking.

title: Much easier than the traditional…
text: Much easier than the traditional method. The agent was kind of pushy especially when we are busy with other things we have to do which are of equal priority.

title: Best initial contact possible. Some waves after that.
text: My initial contact could not have been better. Mark Gustafson is an extremely valuable asset to your organization.  He was thorough, kind, and knew everything about all aspects of the process. I wish he would have been my guy for the entire thing. I did not like being passed along to folks who were not at his level. The Closing Specialist didn't know or confused the difference between escrow and principal/interest portions of the mortgage payment even when asked to recheck. Also had a Purchase Specialist who was not engaged. I was doing the reaching instead of her notifying me. Overall, the process is rock solid. The lack of confidence in one person and meh engagement of another tarnished my opinion. I would still recommend Rocket for the process with fair fees, organized documentation process and of course, Mark G.

title: It was a pretty good experience the…
text: It was a pretty good experience the only snag we had was they didn’t tell us we didn’t have to do the pressign   And we were trying to with no success and it caused some confusion with our closure. Then it took a while to get done one on the phone while the closer was here.

title: ease of preparing
text: Everything went well except it took longer than I thought it would.  It could have went faster by having the water tested sooner.  A list of needed documents could have been requested earliet also.

title: The client advocate at Rocket Mortgage…
text: The client advocate at Rocket Mortgage will take one through the VA loan process up to the closing.

title: Very good mortgage broker.
text: Very good mortgage broker.Very pleasant and helpful customer service. I liked the online status of the loan process; it helped to keep me informed every day.One suggestion, verify and check forms that may be expired or out dated.

title: Loan process
text: The person I first worked with really earned my trust and listened to my concerns. He went on leave due to the birth of his child.  I wish him blessings.  The person who took over did not listen as well.  I got super nervous and anxious and decided I needed to call her to express the concern I was trying to convey with regards to my name update. She finally took a moment to understand but it was not the same give as the original person I worked with

title: Overall satisfaction with re-do experience
text: Initial loan officer expertise. Great on line application process.

title: It took way to long to close and when…
text: It took way to long to close and when the first documents came in they were wrong. Took additional time to fix that. Other than that everyone was very helpful and polite throughout the process.

title: Cash Out Refinance
text: Our loan processor Josephine was very helpful. However, we took cash out to pay debt and the way we received the checks made it difficult to mail the checks easily. My husband and I have seperate accounts but the checks came with only his name on the and one check would have payments for both of us. Also, the checks did not have any account number on them, so we had to research balances and match account numbers, We also had to write letters to creditors explaining why only my husband's name was on the checks and not mine for all of my accounts.This took time and delayed payments. There has to be a better way to make these payments.

title: Our home equity experience
text: Jordan Davenport was our contact person for starting the process of the home equity loan. She is very personable and enjoyed speaking with her. The only issue with the process with her was that she kept reassuring me that the closing costs would not exceed $1500 regardless of the numbers stated on the documents. The closing costs were $300 more. Jordan left the office for some time, I am assuming for vacation. A support person was made available, but was very difficult to make contact. Each time we called, we had to leave a message and the call was not returned until the next day. Even more frustrating was that she couldn't answer any questions and made no attempt to find the answers.The closing went well with the notary in our home and was on time.The only thing that left me with any real disappointment was the difference in the closing cost. $300 is not a lot of money, but its more about a promise not kept.

title: Process was fairly easy
text: Process was fairly easy, a single point of contact would have been better. We had at least 3 people we were dealing with for different reasons. Sometimes that was a point of confusion.

title: Change It
text: Mr. Davis is outstanding.  Keep him!!It is so difficult to change from paperless bills to mail-in payments.  I have tried, unsuccessfully, to request a paper bill monthly.  HELP!

title: Very good company to work with
text: They do go above and beyond for you at least my guy did , Sam Gerling , would’ve given 5 stars had it not been for the 4 times I had ti sign papers , but I can blame the notary’s for that

title: Ease of use and communication is a…
text: Ease of use and communication is a great value in processing a loan. Do your due diligence on rates and discounts.

title: It was fairly smooth
text: It was fairly smooth.  Aggravation on some requests and the accuracy of the final closing dollar requirement.Rocket assumed that I wanted to buy down my rate.  Not given choice.....Not a good look....

title: to always be able to communicate with staff  and having your questions answered is a plus
text: From the moment of the loan application and the loan banker Broderick Battle whom was very very helpful and very and concerning I had a good experience.  Broderick's knowledge and patient help me get through the process.  Being able to connect with Broderick to ask questions regarding the process with which he patiently answered was great.  Overall I thought the staff was great.

title: Great Experience
text: Samantha Glanz made the experience great. She went over and beyond in answering my questions and trying to make the experience flawless.

title: Elizabeth was great through the process…
text: Elizabeth was great through the process but in closing we were both surprised that not everything we thought was to be paid off was.  A long time to get my credit score up and then to processing was quick and easy.

title: Very good experience
text: Very good experience. Fast and easy. The only snag came at the end when the expiration of my mortgage payoff went unnoticed, causing my dispersement to be delayed on e day.

title: a relieved customer
text: Moose made me feel safe. Like I mattered and wasn't just a sale. The signing didn't go as well. The actual signing, not so great. 3 times I waited to hear back just to set a time. Ordinally it was supposed to be the 11th, so that delay put off receiving any money which was mine and I was being charged interest. But everything is good now. Except getting overage paid back. Sorry 1 other matter. Property tax. No one was able to tell me if I needed to refile, so now I need to reach out myself.

title: Initial rep was excellent
text: Initial rep was excellent. Another tried to take the negotiation from her. I objected to manager and insisted that it be returned to her. Not a good policy to allow this to happen.

title: We had a great experience with James for a refinance of our first mortgage./
text: We had a great experience with James, our principal agent and his team. Our only compliant is how difficult it is to speak to the same Team Member!!In the end all went very well and we got what we were aiming for.  Great company and we would deal with them again in the future.

title: Very friendly
text: Very friendly.  It took two months to close on refinance and I keep having trouble with their phone App.  Disappointing as it is, they do answer and try to resolve any problems.

title: When I called to talk
text: When I called to talk to Yaimee, my mortgage specialist, she was very nice but she always called me Ms. Davis - my name is Deans.  She assured me my mortgage would be done by the end of the month.  It wasn't done and I didn't get my money until July 11th.  I didn't get the checks until July 12th,  I just wish I had known.  Everyone I spoke to was very nice.

title: I had a pretty good experience with…
text: I had a pretty good experience with rocket mortgage if I could change one thing it would be the discrepancy between department explaining things to us.  Almost every time we had a question the loan process department would say one thing and my loan officer would say another.

title: Everything was explained very well and…
text: Everything was explained very well and at the signing the person who came to our house was very nice and helpful. The only issue is the system you use to do the documents online. Was not user friendly

title: Please send us a hard copy with photos…
text: Please send us a hard copy with photos of our appraisal. We paid a lot of money for this and never received a copy!

title: Good experience
text: Good experience. Agent personable and helpful. Too much emphasis on lowering my monthly payment. Lower interest rate and consolidated debt was goal.

title: My banker (Mathew Ross) did an…
text: My banker (Mathew Ross) did an absolutely outstanding job. He explained everything in a professional, knowledgeable, and easy to understand way and was always upfront about everything. I never felt like I was being led on and he was always able to answer any questions I had. He checked in regularly and anytime we reached a new milestone in the process he would always call me to check in. He is by far the greatest asset rocket mortgage had in my customer satisfaction. He is excellent at his job. My only complaint and the only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is with the title work. My contact at Amrock did the best she could, but I felt like the underwriting at rocket mortgage kept giving me roadblocks and kind of led me astray. I ended up having to add my wife to the title which was a big decision and should have been told to me upfront. I also had to make adjustments to my survey. These unexpected surprises nearly killed the entire process. These required big changes and should have been told to me much earlier in the process, so I had time to work on them while I was waiting on approvals. This part was really frustrating and I was fortunate I was able to get my survey amended. My last complaint would be I was told this process would take 30-45 days and mine was closer to 70 or 80 days. your program made it seem I was nearly done after conditional approval and I was still over a 40 days away from closing with a lot of big changes being required still. The title work process took way longer than expected.

title: Loan process went perfect as planned
text: Loan process went perfect as planned.  Electronic presigning documents was a complete failure.  Tried calling support … no one answered.

title: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy…
text: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to do everything online and not having to go into an office to get everything signed etc made it easy to schedule everything

title: Aracely was fantastic !
text: The people or person I work with were great. The process took longer than we thought it would. But all in all. Was great experience.

title: Refinancing was a breeze
text: The process was incredibly simple and so straightforward that it made me pause, considering the abundance of scams these days. Unfortunately, my hesitation led to a delay in the process. Although I appreciate working with a team, having a single point of contact throughout the experience would have made me feel more at ease.

title: Everybody was great to deal with
text: Everybody was great to deal with.  The process was clear and ran smoothly with one exception.  It took too many days to be able to see the loan documents.  It wound up that we were forced to review them late at night on the day before closing.  Thanks!

title: Great Loan Guy; Closing Team had a couple of issues
text: Jonathan Bonacci, my loan guy, was great.  He followed up on everything and was always available when I needed him.  The only issue I had was with the Closing Team.  They had my fiancé included in the loan as my husband, although we are not married and I never even mentioned him in any correspondence.  This was supposedly cleared up on 7/31, the day before the closing date, but at the time of the closing 2:30 PM on 8/1 the Notary from the title company said he was still listed on the documents. This resulted in a delay to 7PM on 8/1 to get the closing completed, which really was okay.  However, I then got a voicemail from Bradley from the Closing Team on Monday 8/5 asking me to reschedule my closing because they were showing it as canceled.  Meanwhile I had already received a "Congratulations on your closed loan" email from Rocket Mortgage on Friday, 8/2.  On Monday I also received text messages, and emails from the Closing Team members all asking me to reschedule.  I was in the hospital, so I could not return calls, but I replied to the texts and emails.  Then I never heard back from anyone again.  I was able to confirm that the funds were transferred to the requested account on 8/5, but just found it strange that no one ever followed up to say that everything was okay.

title: Make sure to get all information at the very beginning
text: There was alot of good things that happened while my wife and I were going for a house with them. They were mostly upfront with things just needed to work on making sure that everyone is trained the same way so that way it doesn't get someone's hopes up that they can go with a certain type of mortgage and then fine out during the process that it wasn't the right one for them. Started out with a VA loan and had to switch part of the way through the process to a FHA loan instead due to not meeting the qualifications for the VA loan.  Which was ok, but make sure that you give all information when asking for their help.  Helped with getting credit to where it needed to be in order to get a house at all, so I am thankful for that.  Just make sure when talking to someone that you make sure that what your going for to get ALL INFORMATION AT THE BEGINNING. That way your not having to try to change it when you go to put an offer into a house.

text: Rocket Mortgage is a machine. That being said it is a very efficient machine and they do an excellent job of keeping you on task and on schedule. Being an online platform it is more difficult to make the human connection needed to establish a trust relationship, but most do and that is refreshing.

title: Loan is finally closed, and All is Well!
text: This is my second mortgage with Rocket, and it was not nearly as easy as our first mortgage was, mostly due to communication as to what, if anything, was happening.  We wanted to use some equity in our home to finance some dental damage that happened to my front teeth.  We were advised we could get the money by the end of Aoril, when it was almost the end of May when it was closed, plus no-one could tell us what was holding it up.  Nerve-wracking.  But then it closed fast and without a problem.  Teeth are fixed, waiting for healing before fina work is done, and paid for with the second mortgage from Rocket.

I would have liked more communication through the whole process. In the end it was all worth it and thanks to the team at rocket for helping me purchase my first home.

title: My experience is mainly pleasant
text: My experience is mainly pleasant. Everyone was helpful to the best of their  ability. If they couldn’t help me then they found someone that could. The only negative thing was that there was a delay in the disbursement of funds and still not sure the outcome with the homeowners insurance I wish I knew if it was taken care of.

title: Mortgage Loan Experie ce
text: Our 2nd mortgage loan (cash out) was submitted, underwritten, approved and closed in 6 days!  AMAZING.  The only problem we experienced was not being informed when and how the checks were sent out to us.  UPS, FedEx, USPS, overnight, 2 day?????  Life would had been a tad less nerve wracking if we had been informed.  Other than that, FANTASTIC.

title: All’s well that ends well
text: All’s well that ends well. There were several people who contacted me continuously but some errors in closing documents seemed impossible to get right up to and including the day of closing. Each time I received a call and pointed out an issue, I was passed on to someone else. Some information required was redundant and blame was pointed at the underwriters. Frustrating but finally worked out. Zoom closing worked well

title: Hiccups processing our second mortgage
text: Our first mortgage process was great with no issues. Our second mortgage had some hiccups along the way. I'm guessing because of the automatic system we received multiple phone calls once we started the process for the first 4-5 days. Each time the person we talked to wasn't aware we had already talked to some else. We also had issues sending the requested documents and verifying income.  Just seemed like the whole process this time was challenging.

title: Did not think it would take as long as…
text: Did not think it would take as long as it did because I was an existing customer. Kind of disappointed regarding fha loan

title: I received credits from Rocket Mortgage…
text: I received credits from Rocket Mortgage and the seller. I'm disappointed that they are discontinuing the program. More programs should be available to earn credits. I hope I received the current/ lowest mortgage rate available on the market.

title: The easiest mortgage process ever!
text: The process was easy to do online. Fairly fast and efficient, and found us a good interest rate.The only thing I would say is improving the communication when there is a slow down so clients know what the wait is can be helpful. I did reach out about a slow down, and received answers as to what they were waiting for. Very helpful to be able to communicate everything from that one website.I would definitely recommend Rocket Mortgage.

title: Got the Job Done
text: Overall, the banker was too notch and did an incredibly excellent job digging deep and figuring out fixes to complicated issues.The main problems for me were communication issues between the banker and underwriter that made me make a few mistakes early on, and communication issues between myself and the underwriter that made it difficult to understand what was going on with my loan and what I needed to fix.

title: I didn't even need to leave my home
text: I didn't even need to leave my home.  However, the paper checks to pay off other items is a bit outdated.  Would have preferred an EFT since those checks have still not posted to the respective accounts.Other wise, very exceptional experience!

title: Even when it doesn’t go perfect, it’s great!
text: Aside from getting my documents together Rocket Mortgage did most of the work. I would have given five stars though, had my appraisal not somehow gotten messed up, which caused us some timing issues. Our first refi a couple of years ago was much smoother but we were not paying any bills off with that one so that is probably where the difference came in. I will use them again. Customer service was great. Everyone was knowledgeable and they all were apologetic of the delays that we experienced.

title: Good except for snail mail
text: Overall the experience was quick and easy. I took away a star because everything is done digitally except paying off your debt. You have to buy envelopes and stamps and mail each creditor individually a check that was mailed from Rocket to them. It's the not knowing if they received it or not. All of my creditors are paid on auto payments so I just wish I could have paid the balances the same way. Still having to pay my bills until they receive their check, then have to wait to get your money back from overpaying. Its been over a week and I still don't know if any of the creditors received their payment. Balance is definitely still showing on ALL of my accounts. That process really should be done a little differently but outside of that inconvenience, if I needed to do it all over again, I would.

title: Seamless process
text: Seamless process. Stress free. Easy

title: Sonny was super nice and helpful!
text: Sonny was super nice!I was handed off so many times.Tim Norland with Century 21 was very helpful.It was a very good experience overall.Thanks Rocket Mortgage!

title: Smooth Experience For First Time Buyer
text: Everyone was knowledgeable and friendly. Process was clear precise and smooth

title: When you opt to go with V.A. loans you run into more roadblocks
text: Good communication but we should be able to get a hard copy of our contract for our personal files mailed to us. We're not all computer literate,nor do we want to be!

title: The whole process went well until the…
text: The whole process went well until the virtual signing of the title. It was on a Friday, and during the ID verification process, there are questions to verify your ID. I failed them. I think I know myself pretty well but the questions weren't very good. So I had to either wait 24 hours before I could try again or wait 3 days until Monday for someone to come to my house. This all postponed my payout by a couple of days.

title: Great!
text: Great!! Very helpful and easy to talk to

title: Overall was good.
text: Overall was great..

title: It was a little rough from time to…
text: It was a little rough from time to time. We got thru it.

title: Representative was was very…
text: Representative was was very helpful,undstandble,available when needed and very knowledgeable

title: 2nd Home purchase, very satisfied!
text: Duy Vo was my rep and he did great! Was very easy to get ahold of when needed and checked in often. My only constructive feedback is that different departments did not communicate with each other as well but overall a great experience! This is my 2nd home purchase using Rocket and again I am very pleased!

title: The roller coaster mortgage loan estimate.
text: They did make sure I closed as scheduled.

title: Jaimee Risher is the best of Rocket Mortgage
text: Jaimee Risher, our original agent, was fantastic! Jaimee was very knowledgeable, helpful, friendly, respectful and professional. She was great! We took cash out & paid off a lot of creditors, which is going to save us a ton of money. The lady who came to the house to do our closing (through Amrock) was also great. But, we did not like the part of the process where we had to wait on checks to be delivered and then we had to mail those checks to our creditors ourselves. That is not a good process. We also received some messages during the appraisal process that were confusing, put undue pressure on us to hurry our repairs, were not helpful, and were even a little insulting. Hence 4, rather than 5, stars. We believe that, if Jaimee was in charge of the entire process, you’d be getting 5 stars, hands down. Overall, we’re very happy with our new mortgage. Thank you!

title: Loved the smooth process
text: The process was very smooth, and our contacts were very knowledgeable and professional, and I would certainly recommend Rocket Morgage, however we felt with our very good credit bureaus, we could have gotten a better interest rate

title: It was a good experience
text: It was a good experience, we have used rocket several times. It would have been better had there been someone monitoring the effort. I checked in every day and twice there was an issue that I fixed, I should have been contacted about. I was not. It took longer than I had hoped and there was an issue with the first notary and closing had to be rescheduled. Bottom line was not enough attention. If I had not been on top of it, it would have taken much much longer.

title: Rocket Mortgage team was great my…
text: Rocket Mortgage team was great my suggestion would be to seek another title company that is more upfront and professional.

title: Mr Kareem Sykes originated and…
text: Mr Kareem Sykes originated and facilitated alot of the actions regarding our loan.. his communication was excellent, he was patient, but consistent in reminders, very personable and relatable. Could talk to him like an old friend. His portion in our process was steady and efficient. I'd trust his guidance with my mother and/or sister. I immediately felt the difference in energy once his scope in our process had concluded and we'd been rolled over to the communal client relations agent. Was as consistent or steady with updates. Felt like I was working with A.I. that's the reason for it not being 5⭐️ rating. If Mr Sykes was our agent from start to finish it would've been perfect.

title: Things were great until we nearly…
text: Things were great until we nearly reached the end. The software would not accept which account I wanted funds forwarded to. I had to call it in. Then, processors messed up final rfi, and had me wondering what in the heck I was being required to provide. Otherwise, things went well, and Corey was very helpful.

title: Thanks Rocket Team!!
text: Everyone we worked with on our mortgage team was super supportive and kind. They were accessible for any questions( even when the answers might have already been on your website) and were committed to helping clarify the process so we were more confident with our choices. Last but not least , they moved quickly to match the needs of our seller and we closed quickly, efficiently with everything in order.

title: Deion was amazing he is a great helpful…
text: Deion was amazing he is a great helpful personable guy .The underwriter dept can eat a bag of Penis

title: Attentive staff
text: Attentive staff. Closing agency actually prefers working with rocket!My main complaint is that you try to quote loans with points automatically without asking the customer what they want. Explain to the customer how they work and then go over the differences in payment, interest, etc. Sometimes points don’t make sense for every buyer.

title: Rate went up slightly and pissed me the…
text: Rate went up slightly and pissed me the hell off other than that easy process

title: Everyone I talked with was very patient…
text: Everyone I talked with was very patient and helpful. They responded quickly to my emails, texts, or calls

title: Great options for repayment
text: Great options for repayment. The initial processing for approval could be improved. Maybe provide an FAQ about the relevant terms, e.g., what is debt to ratio and examples of what you're looking for, or maybe an interactive table so customers can see a target of what will be needed. Also, some streamlining to avoid repeated submission of the same documents would help. Overall, Rocket got me where I needed to be, but it was a bit stressful to get relevant information so I could make informed decisions.

title: The overall experience we had was very…
text: The overall experience we had was very good. The closing was done in our home and at a time that worked best for us. After closing, our documents were processed quickly. I would definitely recommend to others.

title: Except for the calls I got every day as…
text: Except for the calls I got every day as well as the weekends, all went well. I am still getting calls by the way. Aside from all that, it was fine.

title: We were supposed to close but something went wrong
text: We were supposed to close with a certain amount down and 3 days before closing, they suddenly said we had to do a different type of loan with 3 times the money down and the final payment was still the same even with more money down and the rate went up more than 0.5% .  The positive was both Jenny V and the other jen never gave up and finally got it done.  More money down, higher rate but at least it is now ours.

title: The new updated mortgage
text: The gentlemen who worked on the mortgage took into consideration my needs and promised much and I will will wait to see how it all goes on..

title: Quick and friendly.
text: Quick and friendly.

title: Rocket Mortgage deserves 5 stars
text: Rocket Mortgage deserves 5 stars, however the closing company, McDonnell & Associates, deserves zero stars. Still waiting on debt payoff checks to be sent to me so I can payoff debts before payments come due again. I have made numerous attempts at contacting them with no replies.  Any help you can provide will be appreciated.

title: The process was very easy
text: The process was very easy. The closing was very interesting. I only wish I was warned that each closing attendant needed their own device. My wife is afraid of computers so needed help, the 2 devices next to each other created a bad echo making communication difficult.

title: As far as the process of the…
text: As far as the process of the refinancing rocket mortgage was very good.  We stayed informed every step of the way.  The only negative thing about our experience is you better get ready for spam calls.  The day after we started with them we started getting 20 to 30 spam calls a day!  But even with the spam calls we were happy with rocket mortgage we were able to get ride of $87,000 of debt and open up a lot of monthly money in our pay to balance out the cost of living during these expensive times

title: Rocket Mortgage Experience
text: When I called in to ask a question, all the agents were very helpful, friendly, and polite. I thought the final stage for the closing took a little longer than what we thought it would, but other than that we had a good experience.

title: The process was handled quickly and…
text: The process was handled quickly and smoothly I do have one complaint and that was with the disbursement of funds.  They were unable to put my funds in my bank of choice which caused a delay in my receiving the money.

title: Everything went well right up to…
text: Everything went well right up to closing on line.  Randomly, put our 3 names in places that we're not correct.  Found at least 3 mistakes and didn't even get to check in.We had to do an in-person closing which went fine.

title: First contact person was very helpful…
text: First contact person was very helpful getting started but after that I was turned over to the electronic monster and it was difficult to get any questions answered after that

title: Rocket Mortgage is very affectionate
text: Rocket Mortgage is very affectionate. They work in a timely manner, making it easy to help you a long the way . Very pleasant hard working .Very detailed, helpful, and so easy to work with . I recommend Rocket Mortgage  to anyone who’s looking to purchase a home.

title: I already did this but very good except…
text: I already did this but very good except for the time it took to complete, too long, and repeatedly asking for the same items multiple times. I really got annoyed with that. I also wish the credit card payments would have been direct deposit.

title: Customer service was very good
text: Customer service was very good. Several times we had messages that we had tasks to accomplish but none were listed. We would call and they would resend or we would log out and back in to get the tasks to appear
